overview: Beware before entering the forest. There`s something bewitching about all the hard wood, soft underbrush, sturdy boulders and gushing rivers. The combination of these elements with fresh air and midsummer sun intoxicates every fiber of your being. The five couples who wander through Bel Ami`s Enchanted Forest find that all paths lead to entrancing sexual interludes.
title: Enchanted Forest
